user_profile: User 22 is an active adult male, likely in his late 20s or early 30s, with a college education and belonging to the middle socioeconomic level. This suggests that he values both physical fitness and social interaction, likely appreciating the chance to connect with friends or unwind in nature after work. His agreeable nature enhances his interactions, fostering friendships and collaborations. Overall, User 22 exemplifies a balanced lifestyle, combining work, fitness, and social activities seamlessly.
